code:
/*
Language: Mojolicious
Requires: xml.js, perl.js
Author: Dotan Dimet <dotan@corky.net>
Description: Mojolicious .ep (Embedded Perl) templates
Website: https://mojolicious.org
Category: template
*/function mojolicious(hljs){return{name:'Mojolicious',subLanguage:'xml',contains:[{className:'meta',begin:'^__(END|DATA)__$'},// mojolicious line
{begin:"^\\s*%{1,2}={0,2}",end:'$',subLanguage:'perl'},// mojolicious block
{begin:"<%{1,2}={0,2}",end:"={0,1}%>",subLanguage:'perl',excludeBegin:true,excludeEnd:true}]};}module.exports=mojolicious;
